channel.title: Projects on Akash Goswami
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Akash Goswami

item.title: Manual Receipt Generator
item.description: A simple python third party terminal client based on the reference receipts app that attaches receipts to Monzo transactions using the Monzo Receipts API and a json payload. You can find the source code here on GitHub.

item.title: TfL to Monzo
item.description: TfL to Monzo was an severless application built as my project for my Cloud Computing module at university with a friend. It was written in Python and made use of AWS Lambda to process TfL jounrey data into Monzo recipts. The Lambda function would recieve incoming transcation webhook events from a linked Monzo account, check if they were TfL transcations and then run a web scraper script to extract the matching journey data from the TfL web portal before then submitting this data as a reciept to the Monzo receipt API endpoint.

item.title: Credit Card Workout
item.description: A website that takes a users credit card balance, interest rate and monthly amount they wish to pay to calculate how long it would take them to pay their debt off as well as showing them how much interest they have accumulated. This was made within 24 hours for the Porticode 2.0 Hackathon. The source code is hosted here on GitHub
